pages.text: Increases the duration of spell effects by 50%. Affects:$(li)Path of Redemption$(li)Path of the Aegis$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepters spells are incredibly long-lasting. Manifests on Redemption if you complete the Enduring Bardic Path of Redemption. Manifests on the Aegis if you completed the Paladins Enduring Path of the Aegis.
